phrases: I made it using only ingredients from this world, too.
Kanna, make you sure you do not destroy them if you run into one.
This morning I was not chastised by Miss Kobayashi for any mistakes.
I must be improving my skills as maid.
Perhaps that means I am getting used to this world, too?
You have been happier lately, have not you, Kobayashi-san?
You used to be a bit more stoic before.
It is like you have become a little more open.
I guess it is been two months since she showed up, huh?
What was I like back then?
The secret is to marinate it in honey.
Then it will grow softer, and the meat will absorb flavor more easily.
Maybe Miss Kobayashi will eat my tail meat if I prepare it like that.
What modern girls want their lover to do most!
2) Pet their head 3) Hold their hand in public 4) Carry like a princess
2) Head petted 3) Holding hands in public
I would love to experience it myself at least once!
Hmm, so they pursue love with sounds.
Early this morning, there was a fire in Tatsumi-cho, Nishi-ku.
Sorry, but could you help me out here?
Whoa, you have taken on an awful lot again.
I want to see Miss Kobayashi working at least once.
One of my 48 maid skills: perception blocking.
Now I can enter without anyone noticing.
There she is, there she is.
Well, thank you for your time.
There was a mistake in the product, and he is in trouble if it is not fixed today.
So for now, I will work on that.
It means I will not be able to help you, Takiya-kun, but is that okay?
It is fine, it is fine.
Hey, can you help me here?
We will have to reevaluate this.
Humans may gather together, help each other, and accomplish many things,
Let us check it one more time.
but their civilization could be easily destroyed by dragons.
So I think dragons are better.
I told you get it done right away, did not I?
When I say right away, I mean right away!
Chief's pushing his work onto Kobayashi-san again...
You need to work to earn your paycheck!
The chief's project is not even that vital.
Quit slacking off and get it finished quickly!
I thought I was blocking perception?
And so many people rely on her, too.
I have not received a report on it yet!
I had a lot of things to do.
Yamashita-kun's work is higher on the priority list.
Do not talk back to me!
Chief's having bad luck today, huh?
Now, I should leave before Miss Kobayashi does...
I just had a feeling you were.
I bet it was boring to sneak a peek at my work, right?
I wanted to know more about you.
You have been happier lately, have not you, Kobayashi-san?
I wonder what I used to be like?
I heard the chief got canned for abusing power.
Someone sent the director a recording of proof.
Now everyone pair up and please draw a picture of your friend.
I bought a bunch of vegetables in season!
Since we got them cheaper than planned, I guess I will buy some snacks for Kanna.
I was surprised to find you standing there.
I have decided to live in this world for a while.
To be honest, I cannot recommend it that strongly.
Then why do not you stay he
Do you have any place to stay?
I will live in some nearby mountain.
Last night there were reports of a monster spotted in the mountains,
The monster was said to stand 20m at full height.
Why do I have to sneak around and hide from humans?
Maybe I should just destroy them all.
You will be living amongst people.
So you have to show some restraint.
I will help search for a place for you to live, Mr. Fafnir.
Please leave it to me, Mr. Fafnir!
I guess I will see what you can do.
Just the other day I watched Miss Kobayashi move out, so I understand the process.
You create a family registration and a proof of citizenship,
also a bank account and a personal seal, then you show them to a realtor.
So, I made them for you myself.
Your dragon form looked like an Ooyama Takeshi, so...
You are growing too close to humans now.
When you return to your world,
will you be able kill humans?
I do not intend to return to my world.
In a century or so, that human you are attached to will die.
The more I treasure these moments and being here right now,
the sadder I will be when that time comes, I am sure.
But I do not want to call those feelings regret.
You think they are worth speaking so highly of?
Because Miss Kobayashi is one of them.
I was just curious about what humans are like in this world.
Oh, if it is not Kobayashi-san's maid.
We are not a pawn shop.
Oh well, I will steal a fittin
I cannot believe there is no money exchange.
Shows the limits of this world.
Are you sure it is not best for you to live in your own world?
I am sure it is hard to live here without a human you get along with.
There is a human you would be all right with, Mr. Fafnir!
Oh, if it is not Fafnir-dono!
I am surprised you knew where I lived.
Actually, would you let Mr. Fafnir here... stay with you for a while?
Well, it is a little cramped, but...
I know I am one to talk, but this dragon's fairly dangerous.
Was Mr. Fafnir really worried about me?
Now let us conduct the experiment according to the chart in your textbooks.
You do not need to use any strength.
Just bend it with your will.
He did not bend it with strength just now, did he?
Does not look like he used magic either.
If I recall, he did something like this...
Ah, you have bent them all.
What were you trying to do?
Now this 100 yen coin will pass through the cup!
Oh, that is what you were doing.
So humans really do have hidden powers?!
I knew Miss Kobayashi was not just an ordinary person!
Anyone can do them once they learn how.
I have heard of this before.
Humans usually only use about 10 of their brain capacity.
In other words, if humans put their minds to it, anyone would be able to use super powers.
To be able to when they try.
You are thinking something weird again.
Lady Tohru, this book was on Kobayashi's shelf.
Oh, that is a book I bought long ago.
So if you do this, then power enters your hand.
Well, I am free, so sure.
Oh, I will fix your spoons first.
You do not need ESP, Tohru.
Will I actually learn how to do it by doing this?
It does not matter if you can do it, does it?
Right now, I have no desires.
What do you want to become?
You can do plenty of things humans cannot, so is not that good enough?
I do not want to lose to humans!
I cannot be inferior to them in any way!
I do not think it is like that, Tohru.
I think you actually want to understand humans,
and that is why you are so desperate to understand what you cannot.
You search for the spoon's center of gravity,
then using the principle of leverage here, there.
Once you understand, it is simple, is not it?
But there are some things that are not that way.
So, Tohru, you should focus on the things only you can do.
I am going to show you a power only I can use!
But do not break anything, okay?
Then there is not much I can do.
Are you the avatar of destruction?
Now, the beautiful lady has entered the box.
This is the super magic of instant teleportation!
Now, it is the moment of the century.
A maid has appeared from the box!
This is not what we planned?
Hey, hey, give me a big helping!
Sweet and sour pork with pineapples?
We are likely to have leftovers, so here is extra.
Miss Kobayashi, I learned new magic!
Please take a look at this coin on a string.
You will fall deeper and deeper in love with Tohru!
